
=head1 NAME

dataset_organization_map

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 dataset (character varying) - 
 organization (character varying) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

             Table "gcis_metadata.dataset_organization_map"
     Column    |       Type        | Modifiers | Storage  | Description 
 --------------+-------------------+-----------+----------+-------------
  dataset      | character varying | not null  | extended | 
  organization | character varying | not null  | extended | 
 Indexes:
     "dataset_organization_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (dataset, organization)
 Foreign-key constraints:
     "dataset_organization_ibfk_1" FOREIGN KEY (dataset) REFERENCES dataset(identifier) ON DELETE CASCADE
     "dataset_organization_organization_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (organization) REFERENCES organization(identifier) ON DELETE CASCADE
 Triggers:
     audit_trigger_row AFTER INSERT OR DELETE OR UPDATE ON dataset_organization_map FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
     audit_trigger_stm AFTER TRUNCATE ON dataset_organization_map FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
